00028 ###############################################################################
00029 #
00030 #  A first version of a set of elliptic cylinders. Already works in the
00031 #  geometry viewer, but still need to run it through the geometry tester. The
00032 #  hard part for that type of geometry is hownear() (requires to solve a 4'th
00033 #  order equation).
00034 #
00035 ###############################################################################
00036 */

00118 template <class Tx, class Ty>
00119 class EGS_ELLIPTIC_CYLINDERS_EXPORT EGS_EllipticCylindersT :
00120     public EGS_BaseGeometry {
00121 
00122 protected:
00123 
00124     EGS_Float *ax,  
00125               *ay,  
00126               *axi, 
00127               *ayi, 
00128               *sx,  
00129               *sy;  
00130     bool  *is_cyl;  
00131     EGS_Vector xo;  
00132     Tx Ax;          
00133     Ty Ay;          
00134     string mytype;  
00135     int    nwarn;
00136 
00137 public:
00138 
00143     ~EGS_EllipticCylindersT() {
00144         if (nreg > 0) {
00145             delete [] ax;
00146             delete [] axi;
00147             delete [] ay;
00148             delete [] ayi;
00149             delete [] sx;
00150             delete [] sy;
00151             delete [] is_cyl;
00152         }
00153     };
00154 
00163     EGS_EllipticCylindersT(int nc, const EGS_Float *x_rad,
00164                            const EGS_Float *y_rad,
00165                            const EGS_Vector &position, const string &Name,
00166                            const Tx &A_x, const Ty &A_y) : EGS_BaseGeometry(Name),
00167         Ax(A_x), Ay(A_y), xo(position), nwarn(0) {
00168         if (nc>0) {
00169             ax = new EGS_Float [nc];
00170             axi = new EGS_Float [nc];
00171             ay = new EGS_Float [nc];
00172             ayi = new EGS_Float [nc];
00173             sx = new EGS_Float [nc];
00174             sy = new EGS_Float [nc];
00175             is_cyl = new bool [nc];
00176             for (int i=0; i<nc; i++) {
00177                 ax[i]=x_rad[i];
00178                 axi[i] = 1/ax[i];
00179                 ay[i]=y_rad[i];
00180                 ayi[i] = 1/ay[i];
00181                 EGS_Float z = ay[i]/ax[i];
00182                 if (fabs(z-1) > 1e-4) {
00183                     sx[i] = 1/(z*z-1)/ax[i];
00184                     sy[i] = z*sx[i];
00185                     is_cyl[i] = false;
00186                 }
00187                 else {
00188                     is_cyl[i] = true;
00189                 }
00190             }
00191             nreg=nc;
00192         }
00193         mytype = Ax.getType() + Ay.getType();
00194     };
00195 
00197     EGS_EllipticCylindersT(const vector<EGS_Float> &x_rad,
00198                            const vector<EGS_Float> &y_rad,
00199                            const EGS_Vector &position, const string &Name,
00200                            const Tx &A_x, const Ty &A_y) : EGS_BaseGeometry(Name),
00201         Ax(A_x), Ay(A_y), xo(position), nwarn(0) {
00202         int nc = x_rad.size();
00203         if (nc>0) {
00204             ax = new EGS_Float [nc];
00205             axi = new EGS_Float [nc];
00206             ay = new EGS_Float [nc];
00207             ayi = new EGS_Float [nc];
00208             sx = new EGS_Float [nc];
00209             sy = new EGS_Float [nc];
00210             is_cyl = new bool [nc];
00211             for (int i=0; i<nc; i++) {
00212                 ax[i]=x_rad[i];
00213                 axi[i] = 1/ax[i];
00214                 ay[i]=y_rad[i];
00215                 ayi[i] = 1/ay[i];
00216                 EGS_Float z = ay[i]/ax[i];
00217                 if (fabs(z-1) > 1e-4) {
00218                     sx[i] = 1/(z*z-1)/ax[i];
00219                     sy[i] = z*sx[i];
00220                     is_cyl[i] = false;
00221                 }
00222                 else {
00223                     is_cyl[i] = true;
00224                 }
00225             }
00226             nreg=nc;
00227         }
00228         mytype = Ax.getType() + Ay.getType();
00229     };
00230 
00231     bool isInside(const EGS_Vector &x) {
00232         EGS_Vector rc(x-xo);
00233         EGS_Float rx = Ax*rc*axi[nreg-1], ry = Ay*rc*ayi[nreg-1];
00234         return rx*rx + ry*ry <= 1 ? true : false;
00235     };
00236 
00237     int isWhere(const EGS_Vector &x) {
00238         if (!isInside(x)) {
00239             return -1;
00240         }
00241         EGS_Vector rc(x-xo);
00242         for (int j=0; j<nreg-1; j++) {
00243             EGS_Float rx = Ax*rc*axi[j], ry = Ay*rc*ayi[j];
00244             if (rx*rx + ry*ry <= 1) {
00245                 return j;
00246             }
00247         }
00248         return nreg-1;
00249     };
00250 
00251     int inside(const EGS_Vector &x) {
00252         return isWhere(x);
00253     };
00254 
00255     int howfar(int ireg, const EGS_Vector &x, const EGS_Vector &u,
00256                EGS_Float &t, int *newmed = 0, EGS_Vector *normal = 0) {
00257 
00258         EGS_Vector xp(x-xo);
00259         int inew = ireg;
00260         int iold = inew < 0 ? nreg : ireg;
00261         int ihit = ireg;
00262         if (ireg < 0 || ireg > 0) {
00263             // Particle is outside or inside but not in the inner-most
00264             // cylinder. Check for intersection with an inner cylinder.
00265             int n = iold-1;
00266             EGS_Float ux = Ax*u*axi[n], uy = Ay*u*ayi[n];
00267             EGS_Float u2 = ux*ux + uy*uy;
00268             if (u2 > 0) {
00269                 EGS_Float xx = Ax*xp*axi[n], xy = Ay*xp*ayi[n];
00270                 EGS_Float xu = xx*ux + xy*uy;
00271                 if (xu < 0) {
00272                     EGS_Float r2 = xx*xx + xy*xy - 1;
00273                     if (r2 > 0) {
00274                         EGS_Float D = xu*xu - r2*u2;
00275                         if (D >= 0) {
00276                             EGS_Float d = r2/(sqrt(D) - xu);
00277                             if (d <= t) {
00278                                 t = d;
00279                                 inew = n;
00280                                 ihit = inew;
00281                             }
00282                         }
00283                     }
00284                     else {
00285                         t = 0;
00286                         inew = n;
00287                         ihit = inew;
00288                     }
00289                 }
00290             }
00291         }
00292 
00293         if (ireg >= 0 && t > 0) {
00294             // If here, particle is inside. Check for intersection with
00295             // the cylinder the particle is in.
00296             EGS_Float ux = Ax*u*axi[ireg], uy = Ay*u*ayi[ireg];
00297             EGS_Float u2 = ux*ux + uy*uy;
00298             if (u2 > 0) {
00299                 EGS_Float xx = Ax*xp*axi[ireg], xy = Ay*xp*ayi[ireg];
00300                 EGS_Float xu = xx*ux + xy*uy;
00301                 EGS_Float r2 = xx*xx + xy*xy - 1;
00302                 EGS_Float d = 1e30;
00303                 if (r2 >= 0) {
00304                     // we think we are inside but the math shows we are
00305                     // outside. Hopefully a truncation problem.
00306                     if (xu > 0) { // moving outwards.
00307                         d = 0;
00308                     }
00309                     else {
00310                         // moving inwards => assume we are at the boundary
00311                         // and r2 >= 0 is a truncation problem.
00312                         d = -2*xu/u2;
00313                     }
00314                 }
00315                 else {
00316                     EGS_Float D = sqrt(xu*xu - r2*u2);
00317                     d = xu < 0 ? (D-xu)/u2 : -r2/(D+xu);
00318                 }
00319                 if (d <= t) {
00320                     t = d;
00321                     inew = ireg+1;
00322                     ihit = ireg;
00323                 }
00324             }
00325         }
00326         if (inew == ireg) {
00327             return inew;
00328         }
00329 
00330         if (normal) {
00331             EGS_Vector xhit = xp + u*t;
00332             EGS_Float xx = Ax*xhit, xy = Ay*xhit;
00333             *normal = Ax.normal()*(xx*ay[ihit]*ay[ihit]) +
00334                       Ay.normal()*(xy*ax[ihit]*ax[ihit]);
00335             normal->normalize();
00336             if (inew > iold) {
00337                 *normal *= (-1);
00338             }
00339         }
00340         if (inew >= nreg) {
00341             return -1;
00342         }
00343         if (newmed) {
00344             *newmed = medium(inew);
00345         }
00346         return inew;
00347     };
00348 
00349     EGS_Float hownear(int ireg, const EGS_Vector &x) {
00350         EGS_Float xx = fabs(Ax*x), xy = fabs(Ay*x);
00351         EGS_Float tperp = ireg >= 0 ? hownear(ireg,xx,xy) : 1e30;
00352         if (ireg && tperp > 0) {
00353             int n = ireg < 0 ? nreg-1 : ireg-1;
00354             EGS_Float t1 = hownear(n,xx,xy);
00355             if (t1 < tperp) {
00356                 tperp = t1;
00357             }
00358         }
00359         return tperp;
00360     };
00361 
00362     const string &getType() const {
00363         return mytype;
00364     };
00365 
00366     void printInfo() const {
00367         EGS_BaseGeometry::printInfo();
00368         egsInformation("Type = %s\n",mytype.c_str());
00369         egsInformation(" midpoint of cylinders = (%g,%g,%g)\n",xo.x,xo.y,xo.z);
00370         int j;
00371         egsInformation(" radii along 'x' =");
00372         for (j=0; j<nreg; j++) {
00373             egsInformation(" %g",ax[j]);
00374         }
00375         egsInformation("\n");
00376         egsInformation(" radii along 'y' =");
00377         for (j=0; j<nreg; j++) {
00378             egsInformation(" %g",ay[j]);
00379         }
00380         egsInformation("\n");
00381         egsInformation("===================================================\n");
00382     };
00383 
00384 private:
00385 
00386     EGS_Float hownear(int ireg, EGS_Float xx, EGS_Float xy) {
00387         if (is_cyl[ireg]) {
00388             return fabs(ax[ireg]-sqrt(xx*xx+xy*xy));
00389         }
00390         double uo = sx[ireg]*xx, vo = sy[ireg]*xy;
00391         double x1 = (uo < 0 && uo > -2) ?
00392                     uo*(uo*uo-4*(vo*vo+3))/(16*(1+vo*vo)) :
00393                     1 - 0.5*vo*vo/(vo*vo+(uo+1)*(uo+1));
00394         int ntry=0;
00395         while (1) {
00396             if (++ntry > 50) {
00397                 if (++nwarn < 20) egsWarning("EGS_EllipticCylindersT::"
00398                                                  "hownear: failed to find solution\n");
00399                 return 0;
00400             }
00401             double vox = vo*x1, uox = uo + x1, xm1 = 1 - x1*x1;
00402             double f = vox*vox - uox*uox*xm1;
00403             if (fabs(f) < 1e-7) {
00404                 break;
00405             }
00406             double fs = 2*(vox*vo + uox*(x1*uox-xm1));
00407             x1 -= f/fs;
00408         }
00409         double y1 = ay[ireg]*sqrt(1-x1*x1) - xy;
00410         x1 = ax[ireg]*x1-xx;
00411         return sqrt(x1*x1 + y1*y1);
00412     };
00413 };
00414 
00415 typedef EGS_EllipticCylindersT<EGS_XProjector,EGS_YProjector>
00416 EGS_EllipticCylindersXY;
00417 typedef EGS_EllipticCylindersT<EGS_XProjector,EGS_ZProjector>
00418 EGS_EllipticCylindersXZ;
00419 typedef EGS_EllipticCylindersT<EGS_YProjector,EGS_ZProjector>
00420 EGS_EllipticCylindersYZ;
00421 typedef EGS_EllipticCylindersT<EGS_Projector,EGS_Projector>
00422 EGS_EllipticCylinders;
